attributes.action: Stop MPs elected in Scotland, Wales and NI from interfering in Engish affairs and give England equal funding and equal access to democracy in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The discrimination against England must be stopped.  The English must be granted equal funding and equal access to democracy, by the abolishment of the Barnett Formula (which ensures that England remains at the bottom of the funding pile) and allowed to elect their own English government (Wales, NI and Scotland all get to elect their own governments, separate from the British government).
MPs elected in Wales, Scotland and NI must not be allowed to interfere in English domestic affairs.  
England is the birth place of democracy and it must be returned to us.  All of England's MPs must be democratically accountable to us.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop MPs elected in Scotland, Wales and NI from interfering in Engish affairs and give England equal funding and equal access to democracy in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12068.asp

Prime Minister's Office
